Atichitire chifundo Mulungu, ndi kutidalitsa,atiwalitsire nkhope yake;
kuti njira yanu idziwike pa dziko lapansi,chipulumutso chanu mwa amitundu onse.
Anthu akondwere, nafuule mokondwera;pakuti mudzaweruza anthu molunjika,ndipo mudzalangiza anthu pa dziko lapansi.
Dziko lapansi lapereka zipatso zake,Mulungu, Mulungu wathu adzatidalitsa.
Mulungu adzatidalitsa;ndipo malekezero onse a dziko lapansi adzamuopa Iye.
